snippet: The new executive, Sandra E. Peterson of Bayer, will be responsible for the company’s consumer units, which have been hit by a series of recalls.
abstract: Johnson & Johnson names Bayer executive Sandra E Peterson as head of its consumer units.
lead_paragraph: The new executive, Sandra E. Peterson of Bayer, will be responsible for the company’s consumer units, which have been hit by a series of recalls.

headline.seo: Johnson & Johnson Names Sandra Peterson to Consumer Health Post
headline.main: J.&J. Names Outsider to Run Its Troubled Consumer Unit
headline.print_headline: J.&J. Names Outsider to Run Its Troubled Consumer Unit
